summary: Comprehensive testing of Battwheels OS EV Command Center completed. Backend APIs working at 94.1% success rate, frontend fully functional with excellent UI/UX. All core features operational including authentication, dashboard analytics, AI assistant, and CRUD operations.

flaky_endpoints.impact: AI diagnosis feature may be slow for users
flaky_endpoints.note: Expected behavior due to GPT-5.2 API call latency

integration_issues.issue: Dropdown option not clickable in some cases
integration_issues.note: Minor UI interaction issue, form still functional

passed_tests: Dashboard stats API with all required metrics
Login page with dark theme and tabs
Dashboard with 4 metric cards and 2 charts
AI Assistant page with category buttons
Inventory page with items and add functionality
All core pages accessible (Tickets, Vehicles, Users, Alerts, Settings)
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider optimizing AI diagnosis endpoint timeout handling and adding loading states for better UX. All core functionality is working excellently.
